title: Britain's Domino's Pizza to exit international market
text:
Britain's Domino's Pizza to exit international market

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 02:17)

(Reuters) - Domino's Pizza Group Plc (L: ), Britain's biggest pizza delivery company, said on Thursday it will exit its international markets, where it has been facing mounting losses. "We have concluded that, whilst they represent attractive markets, we are not the best owners of these businesses," outgoing Chief Executive Officer David Wild said.

Britain's Domino's Pizza to exit international market
description: Britain's Domino's Pizza to exit international market
